data.name: jingor sudoku
data.detailed_description:
Jingor Sudoku is a puzzle game, can be used as a hobby, can challenge intelligence, can be leisure entertainment.

Jingor Sudoku is to fill the number between 1 and 8 in Jingor face (the expanding surface of the cube) with some numbers in accordance with the following two rules into the blank nine grid except the middle grid.
Rule 1: Each number can appear only once in the same side. The middle grid of the ninth grid is invalid. There are 6 sides.
Rule 2: Each number can appear only once in the same edge. There are 12 edges.
Summary rule: that is, each number from 1 to 8 can only appear once on each side or edge.
It is emphasized that the answer to each Jingor Sudoku is unique

The same edge refers to the 8 cells involved by the edge in the cube.
Please refer to: The cells circled in red in the figure below are those with the same edge

data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
